# options

**Instance Property**

A dictionary representation of the options set on the associated persistent store.

## Declaration

```swift
var options: [String : NSObject] { get }
```

## Discussion

A dictionary containing key-value pairs that specify numerous settings for the persistent store. For key definitions, see [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentStoreCoordinator].

## Accessing the Configuration Options

- **sqlitePragmas**: The SQLite pragmas set for the associated persistent store. (read-only)
